overview: In the winter of 1937, after the fall of Nanjing, five students from the Central Army Military Academy, headed by Zhou Zhen, retreated to Zijin Mountain. These five young people don’t know where to go. At this critical moment, they met a dancer and a baby, the bounden duty of a soldier, so they decided to send their last hope to the Rabe safe zone without hesitation
title: Tiger on the Streets
